General.Name: EDESAL Holding SA
General.Description: EDESAL Holding S.A. sub-transports and distributes electrical power in the San Luis Province of Argentina. EDESAL Holding S.A. was formerly known as Edesal S.A. and changed its name to Edesal Holding S.A. in December 2011. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina. EDESAL Holding S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Vap Partners S.A.
